name: backing
content:
backing noun
(SUPPORT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 [ U ] support, especially money, that someone gives to a person or plan: If I go ahead with the plan, can I count on your backing?
More examplesFewer examplesParker's solo on 'A Night in Tunisia' was so amazing that the pianist backing him simply stopped playing.The rock-star arrived in London with her usual entourage of dancers and backing singers.Government backing will be essential if the project is to succeed.Will financial backing for the theatre project be forthcoming?We need to get the backing of someone in authority.
